canopy_api_v3.absolute_return_percent.in:
Absolute Return % reflects total gain or loss as a percentage of initial market value and invested capital.
$$
\text{{Absolute Return \%}} = \frac{{\Delta\text{{Net Gain/Loss}} }}{{\text{{Market Value}}_{{\text{{start}}}} + \Delta\text{{Lifetime Purchase Cost}}}}
$$

canopy_api_v3.benchmark__performance.ind:
Time-Weighted Return measures the portfolio’s performance by eliminating the impact of external cash flows.
$$
\text{{TWR}} = \prod_{{i=1}}^n (1 + R_i) - 1
$$

canopy_api_v3.fx_earnings.indicators.des:
FX Gain/Loss representing the FX impact on Net Gain/Loss.
$$
\text{{FX Gain/Loss}} = \text{{Net Gain/Loss (Historical)}} - \text{{Net Gain/Loss (Snapshot)}}
$$
canopy_api_v3.fx_earnings_change.indicat:
FX Gain/Loss representing the FX impact on Net Gain/Loss.
$$
\text{{FX Gain/Loss}} = \text{{Net Gain/Loss (Historical)}} - \text{{Net Gain/Loss (Snapshot)}}
$$
canopy_api_v3.fx_gain_loss.indicators.de:
Capital FX Gain/Loss representing the FX impact on Total Trading Profit.
$$
\text{{Capital FX Gain/Loss}} = \text{{Total Trading Profit (Historical)}} - \text{{Total Trading Profit (Snapshot)}}
$$
canopy_api_v3.fx_gain_loss_change.indica:
Capital FX Gain/Loss representing the FX impact on Total Trading Profit.
$$
\text{{Capital FX Gain/Loss}} = \text{{Total Trading Profit (Historical)}} - \text{{Total Trading Profit (Snapshot)}}
$$

canopy_api_v3.performance.indicators.des:
Time-Weighted Return measures portfolio performance by isolating investment return from the effect of cash flows.
$$
\text{{TWR}} = \prod_{{i=1}}^n (1 + R_i) - 1
$$
canopy_api_v3.picc.indicators.name: PICC
canopy_api_v3.price_change_percentage.in:
Price Change% measures the percentage change in a security’s price over a specific time period. 
$$
\text{{Price Change\%}} = \left( \frac{{\text{{Price at End date}} - \text{{Price at Start date}}}}{{\text{{Price at Start date}}}} \right) \times 100\%
$$

canopy_api_v3.realized_earnings.indicato: Realised Earnings include profits or losses from closed positions (Realised Trading Profit), as well as distributions, interest, and other cash flows received.
canopy_api_v3.realized_trading_profit.in:
Realised Trading Profit is the profit from trades that have been completed.
$$
\text{{Realised Trading Profit}} = \sum (\text{{Trade Price}} - \text{{Average Cost}}) \times \text{{Quantity}}
$$
canopy_api_v3.realized_trading_profit_ch:
Realised Trading Profit is the profit from trades that have been completed.
$$
\text{{Realised Trading Profit}} = \sum (\text{{Trade Price}} - \text{{Average Cost}}) \times \text{{Quantity}}
$$

canopy_api_v3.total_trading_profit.indic:
Total Trading Profit includes both realised and unrealised profit from trading activity. 
$$
\text{{Total Trading Profit}} = \text{{Realised Trading Profit}} + \text{{Unrealised Trading Profit}}
$$
canopy_api_v3.total_trading_profit_chang:
Total Trading Profit includes both realised and unrealised profit from trading activity. 
$$
\text{{Total Trading Profit}} = \text{{Realised Trading Profit}} + \text{{Unrealised Trading Profit}}
$$

canopy_api_v3.traded_on.indicators.name: Trade Date
canopy_api_v3.transaction_realized_pnl_f: Realised Cash Capital FX Gain/Loss (Base Currency)
canopy_api_v3.tvpi.indicators.name: TVPI
canopy_api_v3.unrealized_earnings.indica: Unrealised Earnings are gains or losses on holdings that have not yet been sold, including unrealised trading profit and accrued interest.
canopy_api_v3.unrealized_earnings_percen:
Represents the proportion of unrealised gains or losses relative to the position’s cost basis.
$$
\text{{Unrealised Earnings \%}} = \frac{{\text{{Unrealised Earnings}}}}{{\text{{Total Cost}}}}
$$
Unrealised Trading Profit is the current profit on open trading positions, based on market price changes.
$$
\text{{Unrealised Trading Profit}} = \sum (\text{{Current Price}} - \text{{Average Cost}}) \times \text{{Quantity}}
$$
canopy_api_v3.unrealized_trading_profit_:
Unrealised Trading Profit is the current profit on open trading positions, based on market price changes.
$$
\text{{Unrealised Trading Profit}} = \sum (\text{{Current Price}} - \text{{Average Cost}}) \times \text{{Quantity}}
$$

Represents unrealised trading profit as a percentage of cost.
$$
\text{{Unrealised Trading Profit \%}} = \frac{{\text{{Unrealised Trading Profit}}}}{{\text{{Total Cost}}}}
$$
canopy_api_v3.worst_performing_underlyin: Worst Performing Underlying Knock In Price
canopy_api_v3.xirr.indicators.descriptio:
IRR is the annualized return that sets the net present value of all cash flows to zero. It reflects timing and size of contributions and distributions.
$$
0 = \sum_{{t=1}}^{{n}} \frac{{CF_t}}{{(1 + \text{{IRR}})^t}}
$$
canopy_api_v3.xirr.indicators.name: IRR

report.common.daiwa.disclaimer:
This product information sheet is produced by Daiwa Capital Markets Singapore Limited and distributed by Daiwa Capital Markets Singapore Limited. This product information sheet and the contents hereof are intended for information purposes only and may change without further notice. Any disclosure, distribution, dissemination, reproduction or printing on this product information sheet without our prior consent or approval is strictly prohibited.

Neither Daiwa Capital Markets Singapore Limited and/or any of its respective parent, holding, subsidiaries or affiliates (""Affiliates""), nor any of its respective directors, officers, servants or employees, represent or warrant the accuracy or completeness of the information contained herein, and will not accept any responsibility or liability whatsoever for any use of or reliance upon this product information sheet or any of the contents hereof.

Neither this product information sheet, nor any consent hereof, constitute, or are to be construed as, (i) an offer or solicitation of an offer to buy or sell any of the securities or investments mentioned herein in any jurisdiction or, (ii) unless expressly provided, any recommendation, opinion or advice. Any view, recommendation, opinion or advice expressed in this product information sheet may not necessarily reflect those of Daiwa Capital Markets Singapore Limited and/or its Affiliates or any of its respective directors, officers, servants or employees except where the product information sheet states otherwise. This product information sheet should not be relied upon by any person in making any investment decision or otherwise advising with respective to, or dealing in, the securities mentioned, as it does not take into account the specific investment objectives, financial situation and particulars needs of any person. You should consult with your own legal, tax, or other advisers before entering into any particular transaction.

The present communication is made following the client's specific request and initiation without any prior solicitation with respect to the information provided in the communication and is for the client's information only. This communication is not intended to be distributed to the general public or to any particular members of the public in the jurisdiction where the client resides and the provision of information contained in or in connection with this communication shall not in any manner whatsoever:

(a) constitute an offer by the Bank to make available, solicit, issue an invitation to purchase or offer for purchase any securities or offer any services in the jurisdiction where the client resides, and none of the information or documents is intended to do so nor is any document intended to be a prospectus; 
(b) be construed as a recommendation by the Bank as the providing of any advice concerning securities or any plan to meet the client's financial needs and objectives, including any investment plan in securities and is not intended to provide the basis for any investment decision, nor to substitute the client's own analysis and investigation, and should not be considered as a recommendation to any recipient of the information.

The client should make their own research of the relevant terms in the material and it is up to the client to make a decision whether to act upon it or not. The client should form their own views of the merits of such a decision based upon such investigations and not rely solely upon any information given in this material. Furthermore, the client is advised to consult their own professional advisors (whether financial, legal or otherwise) in respect to any decision they may wish to make.

Once the specific request has been made by the client, the Bank will, subject to the applicable law, be subject to discuss such developments and opportunities, and answer their questions regarding general materials which they have demanded for and received.

report.common.longtext.disclaimer:
This material has been prepared by Canopy Pte. Ltd for informational purposes only. It is for your use only.
The information in this material have been obtained and derived from sources believed to be reliable, but no representation or warranty is made with respect to the information on its accuracy, completeness, sufficiency and appropriateness for your purposes.

The contents of this document are indicative and subject to change without notice.

The provision of information herein is not prepared in relation to your individual circumstances and should not be relied upon as an assessment for a particular transaction. You should consult your own legal, accounting, tax and other advisors as appropriate.
By accepting and using this material, you are deemed to represent and warrant that you are able to make your own evaluation of its contents and that you are not relying on any person named herein for advice or recommendations, none of whom provide legal, tax, regulatory, accounting or investment advice or owe any fiduciary duties to you in connection with this or any related transactions.

report.common.longtext.exchange_rate_not:
Note:
(1) Currencies are shown based on currency accounts included in data sources such as data feeds or PDF statements. Please note it is possible that a currency account contains no trades, holdings or balances.
(2) The Market Values for the report are based on the following exchange rates. These rates are indicative, and minor rounding differences might occur.
report.common.longtext.performance_attri:
Note:
Simple performance is the percentage change in net worth from beginning to end of the selected period excluding fund flows. It is calculated by dividing net gain/loss by start net worth.
report.common.longtext.performance_by_ch:
Note:
Performance by child account is based on the percentage change in net worth. It is calculated on a daily basis by dividing today's net worth by net worth at the beginning of the selected period.
report.common.longtext.performance_note:
Note:
Performance is based on the percentage change in net worth. It is calculated on a daily basis by dividing today's net worth by net worth at the beginning of the selected period. For the selected benchmarks,
performance is calculated by dividing today's price by the price at the beginning of the selected period.
report.common.table.name: Name
